text: wlkl wahid minkum jaealna warathat yarithun mimaa tarak alwalidan walaqrbwn, waladhin thalftm maeahum balayman almwkdt ealaa alnsrt w'ietayhm shyyana min almirath faetwhm ma quddir lhm. walmyrath balthalf kan fi 'awal al'islam, thuma rufe hukmih bnzwl ayat almwaryth. 'iina allah kan muttalieana ealaa kl shay' min aemalkm, wsyjazykm ealaa dhlk
